info.board:
HalfBoard (HB) - buffet breakfast and dinner. Supplementary drinks for dinner.

All Inclusive (AI) - breakfast, lunch, dinner buffet, between meals / afternoon / during the day snacks, coffee, tea, cake, ice cream / ice cream for children. Local soft and alcoholic drinks available during the hours indicated by the hotel.
info.rooms:
Standard room

• about 25m2

• balcony / terrace

• air conditioning

• TV-SAT, safe (payable), mini bar / fridge, tea and coffee making facilities
